Watch us on GitHub Star

OpenCryptoData

Data platform for Developers

Do you know that Ethereum have 3 test networks?

Project Mission

OpenCrypto.io is an independent community-based project for collecting, organising and free distribution of crypto related data. We are creating platform for storing machine-readable data of any asset (like blockchains, exchanges, dapps etc. ) with focus not only on technical and price data. All collected data are forkable, re-usable and open for all developers to play and build their projects above them. Our mission is to establish self-sustaining community that could find those information useful and would edit data by itself. By this OpenCrypto could become verified source of truth for whole ecosystem and help to fulfill promises of decentralization.

Data is licensed under ODC Open Database License (ODbL) which allows share, create or adapt our database. As long as you attribute, share-alike and keep open. Read full text

How to use this data?

Most project are relying on private databases keeping everyone's data locked and unverifiable. We want exact opposite. Anyone can use our data for his project, anyone can submit changes to shared database and its up to community if those changes will be updated. Currently is database located on GitHub.com/OpenCrypto-io in form of JSON files, but we are already implementing IPFS for further innovation.

Open-Database Structure & Syntax

Data are formatted in form of .yaml files (simpler JSON) in Collections folder on GitHub. Every asset folder contains project.yaml file and relevant attachments.
Information structure of every asset is defined on schema.OpenCrypto.io. You can see full definitions and apply queries here in editor.

Try our Data Explorer for your easy data discovery

You can use explorer.OpenCrypto.io to easily access and search through data in shared database. We even created chrome extension to edit assets project.yaml files on GitHub.com in interactive form.
